channel.title: 1 more question
channel.description:
how excatlly do i add commands??? i was readin some tuts but non of em acaully tell me how to make commands... for example i want a command when u type ::fav gives u a set of items that i picked... and if i add a mini game how do i make a command that takes me there? if u have seen a tut or know how 2 plz post ty
~~~apple pie~~~

for the tele ones… i have 2 fill in the cords right?

item.title: 1 more question
item.dc:creator: @pkiller pkiller
item.description:
@pkiller wrote:

here is how to make an item command

else if (command.startsWith("command name")) { addItem(item id, number of items); }

here is how to do a tele command(i found out 4 hrs ago yay)

else if (command.startsWith("name here"))
     {
     if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970) 
     {
     sendMessage("cant tele past 20 message");
     }
     else if (absY <= 3672)
	{
                heightLevel = 0;
                teleportToX = cords;
		teleportToY = cords;
	}
     else if (absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970)
	{
                heightLevel = 0;
                teleportToX = cords;
		teleportToY = cords;
	}
     else if (absY >= 10112)
     {
     sendMessage("cant tele past lvl 20 wild message here");
     }
     }

i use phone scape press ctrl+f in your clint.java serch for empty and put it below that code
